ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Zahal the Vile/Fabian questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember helping out a cleric friend of mine on his armour quests before, and Zahal is a part of that. We were looking for Zahal just south of the gypsy camp
ygData.messageBody:
I remember helping out a cleric friend of mine on his armour quests
before, and Zahal is a part of that.

We were looking for Zahal just south of the gypsy camp and tower, but
north of the wizzie spires. It used to be on a regular timed spawn
and he had the times through good fortune, but they'll have been reset
since. I do remember it was a long spawn time however :-(

I think Zahal is the first one, I just remember that killing the first
made the second NPC spawn for the cleric armour, and the second one
spawns right at the north end, wanders a bit and then gets killed by
the werewolf hunters!! Nasty!

On Sat, 17 Jun 2000 17:41:37 -0400, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las
Vegas)" <garramone@...> wrote:

>the only time i ever saw Zahal the Vile he was roaming near the gypsy camp.
>i've never actively looked for him.
>
>Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
>Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>> Anyone know where in teh North Karana Zahal the Vile spawns?
>> I assume the
>> Undead Monolyth, but I spent a loooong time there and no Zahal. Hints?
>>
>> Also, Has Fabian been spotted yet?

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (45)
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt!

Mith Marr server
